5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Abdullah bin Mughaffal said:“The Prophet of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Between every two Adhans there is a prayer.’ He said it three times, and on the third time he said, ‘For those who wish.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ قَبْلَ الْمَغْرِبِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the two Rak’ah before the Maghrib
